channel.title: ::Pure command
channel.description:
Hey there. I finally coded easy, medium, hard and extreme shit, so when they login they can choose. But i wanna add ::pure command ONLY FOR THEESE THAT HAVE CHOSEN EASY ! 'Easy (5000 XP + ::pure)
how to add the command so only the players that have choosen the easy shit to use pure command ?

item.title: ::Pure command
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

blank2006:

Try this

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/285312-pi-make-master-pure-command-single-use-noob-friendly.html

No.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pure command
item.dc:creator: @blank2006 blank2006
item.description:
@blank2006 wrote:

Try this if (playerCommand.equals("pure") && c.pure == 0) { if(c.pure == 1) { c.sendMessage("You can no longer use pure, try ::setlevel."); return; } int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.pure = 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pure command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Lirimoo, post:7, topic:471978”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=589663.msg4176586#msg4176586 date=1355067052]

     if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME") && yourSetting == true) {
          doAction();
     }

I don’t see how it can be simplified without doing it for you.
[/quote]

Awwwwwhhhh
Can u compare this with the command ?
So wait i show u the char file when i use easy mode.

easyMode = true mediumMode = false hardMode = false extremeMode = false finishTut = true[/quote]
It’s by far the easiest thing you can do.
Change “yourSetting” that team rocket provided you with; with “easyMode”
Then add the command under it as like normal

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pure command
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_MAKER_Carlos RSPS MAKER Carlos
item.description:
@RSPS_MAKER_Carlos wrote:

hey !
ima help you since you helped me you using trisidiax as i keep seeing :P?

			if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && c.playerRights == 3) {
				if (c.inWild())
				return;
			c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(60)+5;
			c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(0);
			c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5;
			c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(2);
			c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5;
			c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
			c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(70)+5;
			c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(4);
			c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(55)+5;
			c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(6);	
		}

f you want everyone to use it put it under public void players

im coding my server and when it is done it will be nothing like trisidiax.

Read full topic
